description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

You exploit elevation to deliver especially deadly attacks from afar. When performing a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.MBNI94tbMoqizPUk]{Trick Attack (Ex)} with a sniper weapon, and so long as you’re at least 20 feet above your target for every 100 feet between you and the target (minimum 20 feet), you gain a bonus to the attack’s damage equal to half your operative level. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KHg9HjJVua1BA6ti]{Debilitating Sniper (Ex)} exploit to learn this exploit.

modifiers.name: High-Ground Sniper
modifiers.notes: When performing a trick attack with a sniper weapon, and so long as you’re at least 20 feet above your target for every 100 feet between you and the target (minimum 20 feet), you gain a bonus to the attack’s damage equal to half your operative level.
